Replying to @brianleroux 2022-10-28 16:13
@brianleroux @mjackson @remix_run Yeah, agreed. I also think "serverside", doesn't have to mean "serverful". If I can do things in advance, I will. If I can't, but can do things serverless, I will. If I can't, but can add a server, I will.

Replying to @mjackson 2022-10-28 16:07
@mjackson @remix_run "It's usually better to have a server if you can!" do you mean for Remix, or for all? Because in general, I have the inverse of this opinion. ‚Äî It's usually better to avoid having a server if you can. I'm a fan of the rule of least power, so only want to add a server if needed.
